name: React JS Basics
description: Introduction to React JS and building interactive UIs.

lessons.name: React Components
lessons.description: Understanding components, JSX, and component hierarchy.

lessons.name: State and Props
lessons.description: Managing state and passing props between components.

lessons.name: React Hooks
lessons.description: Using hooks like useState and useEffect for functional components.

name: HTML Fundamentals
description: Learn the basics of HTML and structuring web pages.

lessons.name: HTML Elements
lessons.description: Overview of common HTML elements and their usage.

lessons.name: HTML Forms
lessons.description: Creating and handling forms in HTML.

lessons.name: HTML Semantics
lessons.description: Using semantic HTML for better accessibility and SEO.

name: CSS Styling
description: Introduction to CSS and styling web pages.

lessons.name: CSS Selectors
lessons.description: Using selectors to style HTML elements effectively.

lessons.name: Layout and Positioning
lessons.description: Techniques for page layout using Flexbox, Grid, and positioning.

lessons.name: CSS Animations
lessons.description: Adding animations and transitions to enhance user experience.

name: JavaScript Essentials
description: Learn core JavaScript concepts and programming fundamentals.

lessons.name: JavaScript Syntax
lessons.description: Understanding variables, operators, and control structures.

lessons.name: Functions and Scope
lessons.description: Defining functions and understanding scope in JavaScript.

lessons.name: DOM Manipulation
lessons.description: Interacting with the DOM to create dynamic web pages.

name: TypeScript Fundamentals
description: Introduction to TypeScript and static typing in JavaScript.

lessons.name: Type Annotations
lessons.description: Using type annotations to catch errors at compile time.

lessons.name: Interfaces and Types
lessons.description: Defining custom types and interfaces in TypeScript.

lessons.name: TypeScript with React
lessons.description: Integrating TypeScript into React applications.

lessons.name: Node.js Setup
lessons.description: Installing Node.js and setting up your first server.

lessons.name: Modules and Packages
lessons.description: Using Node.js modules and managing packages with npm.

lessons.name: File System
lessons.description: Reading and writing files with Node.js file system module.

name: Next.js Fundamentals
description: Building server-side rendered React applications with Next.js.

lessons.name: Next.js Pages
lessons.description: Creating pages and routing in Next.js applications.

lessons.name: Data Fetching
lessons.description: Fetching data using getStaticProps and getServerSideProps.

lessons.name: API Routes
lessons.description: Creating API endpoints within Next.js applications.

name: Express.js Essentials
description: Learn building backend APIs using Express.js.

lessons.name: Express Setup
lessons.description: Setting up an Express.js server and basic routing.

lessons.name: Middleware
lessons.description: Using middleware for request processing in Express.

lessons.name: Routing and APIs
lessons.description: Defining routes and building RESTful APIs with Express.

name: MongoDB Basics
description: Introduction to MongoDB and working with NoSQL databases.

lessons.name: MongoDB Setup
lessons.description: Installing MongoDB and connecting to a database.

lessons.name: CRUD Operations
lessons.description: Creating, reading, updating, and deleting documents in MongoDB.

lessons.name: Indexes and Aggregation
lessons.description: Using indexes and aggregation pipelines for efficient queries.

name: Git & GitHub
description: Version control using Git and collaboration via GitHub.

lessons.name: Git Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to Git commands and repository management.

lessons.name: Branching and Merging
lessons.description: Working with branches, merges, and resolving conflicts.

lessons.name: GitHub Collaboration
lessons.description: Using GitHub for pull requests, issues, and project collaboration.

lessons.name: REST Principles
lessons.description: Understanding the principles of RESTful API design.

lessons.name: API Endpoints
lessons.description: Creating and testing API endpoints.

lessons.name: Authentication and Security
lessons.description: Securing APIs using authentication and authorization techniques.

name: Full Stack Project
description: Applying full stack development concepts in a final project.

lessons.name: Project Setup
lessons.description: Planning and setting up a full stack project.

lessons.name: Frontend Implementation
lessons.description: Building the user interface and integrating with backend APIs.

lessons.name: Backend and Deployment
lessons.description: Implementing backend functionality and deploying the project.
